chains.name: Polygon
chains.description: Polygon (formerly Matic Network) is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum, aiming to provide faster and cheaper transactions. It supports building diverse multi-chain applications and Ethereum-compatible blockchains.

chains.name: Optimism
chains.description: Optimism is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum, using Optimistic Rollups to increase transaction speed and reduce fees. It maintains compatibility with Ethereum, enabling seamless interaction between layers.

chains.name: Aptos
chains.description: Aptos is a decentralized permission smart contract platform biased towards low-latency management of assets.

chains.name: Arbitrum
chains.description: Arbitrum is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum that improves scalability via Arbitrum Rollups. It increases transaction throughput and decreases costs while maintaining strong security and Ethereum compatibility.

chains.name: Binance Smart Chain
chains.description: Binance Smart Chain (BSC) is a blockchain network built for running smart contract-based applications. It operates parallel to Binance Chain, offering high-speed, low-fee transactions, and is compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM).

chains.name: Ethereum
chains.description: Ethereum is an open-source blockchain platform that supports smart contracts. It provides a decentralized global infrastructure, allowing developers to build and deploy a variety of applications.

chains.name: Cosmos
chains.description: Cosmos is a decentralized network of independent blockchains. Its goal is to solve scalability and interoperability issues in blockchain ecosystems via a protocol known as the Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC).

chains.name: Sui
chains.description: Sui is a decentralized permission smart contract platform biased towards low-latency management of assets.
